name: Orgeat Lemonade
description: This drink combines traditional bar staples into a tasty non-alcoholic drink that's both tasty and elegant.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce fresh lemon juice from 1 lemon
Garnish: lemon peel or fresh herb sprig (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Add lemon juice, orgeat, and water to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into a highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with lemon peel or fresh herbs if desired.
